accommodation.headline: Room stay
accommodation.briefDescription: Portuguese inspired architecture guest house in Candolim
accommodation.description:
For those wishing to discover an enchanting and peaceful experience, the guest house is an intimate guest house in goa offering exceptional Goan hospitality. The guest house, set around a lush tropical garden offers elegant comfort combined with traditional Portuguese inspired architecture.
The guest house boasts eight beautifully appointed suites offering facilities and comfort that match international standards in a paradise ambiance. Our many returning guests value the guesthouse as an oasis, a home away from home, where they can be pampered by the exceptional service and personal attention of our friendly, smiling and helpful staff.
Our spacious, stylish and well-appointed air conditioned guest suites offer exceptional comfort.
All suites have king sized beds, flat screen cable TV, wifi, 24 hrs hot/cold water, refrigerator, fresh flowers and round the clock security.
Large French windows open out on to your own private balcony or terrace. The elegant penthouse with its very generously sized rooftop terrace is ideal and perfect as a honeymoon suite. The rooms have a beautiful view of the lush romantic garden and the hills beyond.
We look forward to welcoming you to the Guest House in Goa and ensuring you an unforgettable stay that you will cherish forever.

address.addressLine1: Sinquerim CandolimBardez, Goa

accommodation.headline: Deluxe Room stay
accommodation.briefDescription: Breathtaking views of the Natha Top Ranges
accommodation.description: We offer you a warm welcome, exceptional luxury and impeccable accommodation, all under one abode. Whether you are a traveller or a nature enthusiast, we are sure to awe you with our world class service and amenities. The Villa accommodation at here redefines your every resort experience. From personal chefs to spacious bedrooms offering spectacular views and providing you with the best in global entertainment, we are proud to say that we have it all covered. Every amenity in our luxurious villa was designed with your ultimate comfort in mind. Inspired by the nature and nestled in its own secluded surroundings, with breathtaking views of the majestic Natha Top ranges, one can ease their mind and restore their spirit. A warm sense of renewal awaits you in a peaceful, stirring atmosphere. Come feel one with Mother Nature!

accommodation.headline: Hemant stay
accommodation.briefDescription: Luxury Atop the Hill
accommodation.description: WELCOME TO THE MANGO INN The Mango Inn welcomes you to our quaint village Dapoli, situate in Ratnagiri district of Maharashtra, accessible, yet conveniently away (200 – 225 kms) from major prominent cities like Mumbai and Pune. Many attractions surround it including pristine beaches of Harne, Murud, Karde and Anjarle, old and well preserved temples like Keshavraj, Kadyavarcha Ganpati and one of the renowned agricultural universities, Konkan Krishi Vidyapeeth. At The Mango Inn, we offer luxurious accommodation and personalised service. Away from city; perched on a hillock, we offer the comforts of a city house in picturesque setting that countryside offers.

address.addressLine1: Jungle Inn, Nagarahole,19th Kilometer, Hunsur-Murkal-Nagarhole Road, Hunsur Taluk, MysoreVeerana Hosahalli, Karnataka 571105

location.otherActivities:
Besides offering wildlife and eco-tourism activities it has been our constant endeavor to offer more nature oriented activities to our guests with varied interests. Hence we have ventured into areas such as trekking, rappelling, still and white water rafting and boating.
Wildlife Tour - Being the very first wildlife adventure resort in this part of Nagarahole National Park we have the experience to conduct wildlife tours at appropriate timings, marked routes, and predetermined spots for wildlife viewing, bird watching, and studying of habitat etc. Our drivers are well trained and local inhabitants and have this extra sense to spot/locate animals/birds
NOTE: &Guests also have the option of using own vehicle and going out on this tour. Please ensure all rules set forth my forest department are strictly followed once inside the national park. Any act against the rules can lead to confiscation of the vehicle and arrest. Jungle Inn will not take any responsibility in such incidents.
Eco Tour - We organize visits to tribal settlements, Tibetan settlements and monasteries, coffee plantations in Coorg which gives our guests a chance to interact with these people and study their culture.
Jeep Safari to Wayanad - Long safaris by jeeps will be provided for guests who wish to spend a longer time in the wild. Safaris to Tolpetty in Wayanad Reserve Forest (Kerala) would take approximately 4 hours and involves about 1 ½ hour ride through the mud tracks of the forest
Rafting and Rappelling - We organize white water rafting in Coorg during July-September. Still water rafting, coracle ride, speed boat ride in Hairige Lake, which is relatively close to the resort. Rappelling and rock climbing can be organized with advance notice.
Trekking - Trekking is arranged to Irpu Waterfalls and Brahmagiri Ranges upon request. A Forest Department Guide accompanies the trekkers for the Brahmagiri trek and advance notice is necessary.
Boating - Boating in Kabini backwaters is possible provided we have advance intimation/reservation to obtain a Forest Department Permit.
Leisure - For those who want to take it easy, could try light activities such as coracle ride, bicycle ride on the fringes of the forest, and watching birds in and around the resort area.

accommodation.headline: Double Room stay
accommodation.briefDescription: Luxury homestay resort in the vicinity of Corbett National Park
accommodation.description:
The property is situated in the heart of the Terai, 250 kms from Delhi, 70 kms from Naini Tal, in the vicinity of Corbett National Park. It has a 200 acre farm with orchards of luscious mangoes and litchies. It is set in a truly beautiful garden with ancient trees and climbing creepers ablaze with colour. The accommodation consists of six well-appointed air-conditioned suites with private balconies/terraces, two large living and dining rooms and one luxury tent. For dinning out there is a bar-be-cue and bonfire area set in a mango orchard. It also has a Gymnasium and a Spa with a state of the art Turkish Hamam and Jacuzzi for seven.
The Rates mentioned below are for double occupancy/ twin sharing basis.
accommodation.onsiteFees:
Kids Below 5 years: Complimentary Stay 2 Kids ages 6-12 years: Rs.1000/- per head per night with breakfast Extra Adult: Rs.1500/- per person per night with breakfast
Extra Kid/ Adult charges should be payable directly to the owner at the time of Check-In.

location.otherActivities: Wildlife excursions to Corbett National Park, excursions to Naini Tal, Raniketh, Spa with Hamam, Jacuzzi and well equipped Gym

accommodation.headline: Deluxe Room stay
accommodation.briefDescription: Beautiful Cottage Stay Near Naldehra, Himachal Pradesh
accommodation.description:
Situated on Mashobra - Naldehra Road, theis Cottage comprises several double-walled Himalayan stone cottages. Each cottage unit consists of three levels; the lower level is classified as a studio apartment and the upper two levels make up the duplex cottage. Each duplex cottage has a living room and two spacious bedrooms with attached bathrooms and balconies. The studio apartments have one bedroom with attached bathroom. All duplex cottages and studio apartments have cable television, coffee/tea maker and refrigerator. A kitchenette with modern-day equipment and utensils is also present in each cottage and apartment. Guests can cook food in kitchenette or head towards the in-site vegetarian restaurant to savour scrumptious dishes.
The cottage can organise mountain hiking, river rafting and other such activities on a special request of guests. For attaining their maximum satisfaction, it offers various facilities such as laundry service, doctor-on-call, car rental, sufficient car parking space and travel assistance.
accommodation.onsiteFees:
Child 05-12-years: Rs.1000/- per night per child payable directly to the owner at the time of Check-In.
Person above 12-years: Rs.1500/- per night per person payable directly to the owner at the time of Check-In.
Mentioned Room Rates are inclusive of TAX%
Please note the mentioned package are not valid during X-Mass and New Year Eve. If you required any others information, please let us know. The same would be provided to you on priority.

accommodation.headline: Aakash stay
accommodation.briefDescription: Backwater Ayurvedic Homestay
accommodation.description:
ABOUT US We welcome you to experience the Kerala Hospitality (South Indian) at its best. Nestled in virgin backwater town called Vaikom located to the north of Kumarakom. On your arrival, Your host Preethy will guide you about your accommodation and how to make it memorable!
YOUR ACCOMMODATION Our home is a blend of Kerala Architecture with modern facilities ensuring your comfortable stay with us. Experience the house where it rains directly in the central courtyard pond (Nadamuttom) of the house.There are 6 private rooms with attached modern bathrooms. Each room can easily accommodates upto 2 adults and a child. To offer you we also have separate Dining Room, TV room, open terrace and Library with over 3000 books in different categories.
YOUR ROOM - Welcome Drink - Real Wooden bed with 8 inches spring mattress - Quality & Clean bed linen - Bathroom has separate Dry & Wet Area Includes Bath Towels, Hand Towels, Bath Mat, Bathing Soap, Hand Soap, Tooth Paste, Shampoo, Toilet Roll, Running Hot & Cold water. - Packaged drinking water - Daily Housekeeping service. - Rooms with natural air flow & Fans - Air Condition (Selected rooms) - Wooden wardrobe with hangers - Luggage Rack - Writing Table & chair WITH OUR COMPLIMENTS With our compliments you may avail: - Free Wi-fi - Kids play area - Selected indoor and outdoor games - Library or simply relax on the hammock by the pond in our plush green lawns. Note: the booking is inclusive of world famous kerela breakfast too!!
ACTIVITIES Indulge yourself in the Rejuvenation Massage and Therapies provided by the Ayurvedic Spa in the same compound. Watch the Toddy Tapping process in the morning and evening. Take a village tour on feet or on bicycle and watch the coir threads and mat making. Visit the mighty Vembanad lake, the historic Vaikom Temple, Kumarakom Bird Sanctuary are some of the main attractions.

address.addressLine1: Killiyatunada, Near RTO Test Ground, East Gate Road, Vaikom PO, Kottayam District, Kerala

location.otherActivities:
GOING AROUND Backwater / Canals - 0kms Vaikom Mahadeva Temple - 2kms Vembanad Lake - 2 kms Kumarakom Bird Sanctuary: 9kms Kumarakom - 10kms Kochi City - 35 kms Fort Kochi - 38 kms Allepey Beach - 38 kms
ONWARD JOURNEY Vaikom Bus Stand: 2kms Kochi Airport: 58kms (1.5 hrs drive) Ernakulam Railway Station: 34kms (1hr drive) Kottayam Railway Station: 35kms (1hr drive) Munnar: 127kms (3 hrs drive) Thekkady: 128kms (3 hrs drive) Kovalam Beach: 197kms (4hrs drive) Calicut: 201kms (4 hrs drive)

accommodation.headline: Double Room stay
accommodation.briefDescription: Experience a unique feeling of Serenity!
accommodation.description:
The homestay is designed so that it is self sufficient and offers privacy while enjoying the benefits of the main house and its surroundings. That way, we can still sleep if your snoring puts a wild bison to shame (did we mention you can occasionally see some. However you are not allowed to hunt them. It's against the law... though the law doesn't specify whether it's illegal to ride them).
The Accommodation comes with an attached bath and a small kitchenette and is furnished to make it comfy and cosy (If your partner finds the room too cosy and wishes to lounge around while you want to be up and about, we will help you drag him/her out of bed for a nominal fee). It has an independent entry from our driveway, a small covered patio and a private lawn with outdoor seating.
The Kitchenette is equipped enough for you to rustle up a quick meal for yourselves, should you wish to stay in. And Guys - if your culinary abilities are limited to just boiling water, be nice to your ladies and atleast do the dishes.
Breakfast is provided on all days. Lunch and Dinner can be arranged at an additional cost with prior notice. However, we would encourage you to grab a bite at some of the good eateries in town on weekdays.

address.addressLine1: KARAKKATT HOLIDAY HOME HOMESTAY AND A/C ROOMSMuttil (PO), Muttil Town,WayanadMuttil, Kerala 673122India

location.otherActivities:
Chembra Peak
At a height of 2100 metres, the towering Chembra Peak is located near Meppadi in the southern part of Wayanad. It is the tallest of peaks in the region and climbing this peak would test ones physical prowess. The climb up the Chembra Peak is an exhilarating experience, as each stage in the climb unfolds great expanses of Wayanad and the view gets wider as one goes up to its summit. Going up and coming down the peak would take a full day. Those who would like camp at the top are assured of an unforgettable experience.
Those who require camping gear may contact the District Tourism Promotion Council, located at Kalpetta in Wayanad.
Neelimala
Located in the southeastern part of Wayanad, and approachable from Kalpetta as well as Sulthan Bathery, Neelimala is a trekkers delight, with options for different trekking routes. At the top of Neelimala, the sight is a breathtaking one with a view to the Meenmutty falls located near by and the valley in the foreground.
Meenmutty waterfalls
Located close to Neelimala the spectacular Meenmutty falls can be reached through a 2 km trekking route from the main road connecting Ootty and Wayanad. It is the largest of waterfalls in the district of Wayanad, and adds to ones curiosity with its three stage falls dropping from about 300 metres.
Chethalayam
Yet another waterfall that attracts visitors to Wayanad is the Chethalayam falls, located close to Sulthan Bathery in the northern part of Wayanad. This waterfall is smaller in size when compared to Meenmutty. The falls and the adjoining areas are ideal locales for trekking and a haunt for bird watchers.
Pakshipathalam
Pakshipathalam is located deep within the forest in the Brahmagiri hills at an altitude of more than 1700 metres. The region predominantly comprises large boulders, some of them really massive. The deep caves found here are home to a wide variety of birds, animals and distinctive species of plants. Pakshipathalam is located near Mananthavady and a visit to the region would require a 7 km trek through the forest, starting from Thirunelli. Visitors to Pakshipathalam are to seek permission from the DFO- North Wayanad.
Banasura Sagar Dam
The dam at Banasura Sagar is reckoned as the largest earth dam in India. The dam is located in the southwestern part of Wayanad district and is close to the Karalad Lake. The project area of the Banasura Sagar Dam also has the start point for treks to the Banasura Peak. An interesting feature is a set of islands that were formed when the reservoir submerged the surrounding areas.
While you take in the captivating sights, sounds and fragrance of Wayanad, you may also shop for some specialities of Wayanad like spices, coffee, tea, bamboo products, honey and herbal plants.

accommodation.headline: Superior Double Non A/C stay
accommodation.briefDescription: Heritage Homestay Cochin
accommodation.description:
This is a heritage house now convert into a boutique bed & breakfast accomodation in fort cochin.
After working for Starwood Hotels (Sheraton Jumeirah Beach Resort) in Dubai, I decided to start my b & b accommodation to provide professional and friendly service for our guest who wants to make their holidays in Kerala memorable.
We are located behind saga away from the crowd but easily reachable to all tourist destinations in Kerala by road.
Only few minutes walk to reach jewish synagogue, spice market, jain temple, dutch palace etc., and it takes only 5 minutes to reach chinese fishing nets, santa cruz basilica, st. francis church, indo portugues museum and other historical places in cochin.
Fort cochin ( kochi ) is an old english town with lots of history and colonial buildings.
We are in a calm and quite location with clean surrounding.
Our guest will get homely atmosphere in our place because we live on ground floor and the first floor is opened for guest with a private entrance to get more privacy of a hotel.

accommodation.headline: Super Deluxe Room stay
accommodation.briefDescription: Home away from home
accommodation.description:
The property, is the epitome of distinctive living characterized by outstanding levels of comfort, convenience and security to visitors during their stay.
Truly a place to call home, apartments are fully integrated with leisure amenities and offer the best in design and quality and echo the distinctive international character evident from its imposing architecture.
Located in the town of Mcleodganj, Dharamshala in the hill state of Himachal Pradesh, India's top tourist destination, it provides warm, comfortable and home like accommodation to thousands of visitors each spring, summer and fall from all over the world.
PACKAGE INCLUDES WELCOME DRINK ON ARRIVAL ASSORTED COOKIES PLATTER ON ARRIVAL DAY TEA/ COFFEE MAKER IN THE ROOM ( REPLENISHED ONCE A DAY ) MINI BAR IN ALLTHE ROOMS (chargeable basis). 2 BOTTLES OF MINERAL WATER PER DAY. 1 CHILD BELOW 6 COMPLIMENTARY ON PLAN.
The property overlooks the towns of Dharamshala, Naddi, Forsythganj, Gaggal, Kangra and the splendid view of The Kangra valley. The Dhauladhars - the snow white mountains that rise 4,000 m above the valley provide a dramatic backdrop.
The location of the villa is such that it is convenient & centrally located , yet away from the bustling town square. Luxuriously furnished room with attached baths private Entrances & balconies. sit out lawns with mountain & valley views. Room Kitchenette (incl. microwave, electric kettle, refrigerator & sink) Walking distance to the Tibetan Library 2 min walking distance from the mall. Situated Adjacent to the Dalai Lama Temple. (Get your positive vibes 24 hours) Shuttle Service available to the airport. Safe & Private Parking. Money Exchange Facility. Doctor on Call Same Day Laundry Services Car Rental Customized Sight Seeing Credit Card Faclity Tea/Coffee making Facilities Mini bar Refrigirator Helpful warm & Friendly Room Services(F/M) Wi-Fi Internet access.

accommodation.description: A cozy and stylish home stay near to the Periyar Tiger Reserve, with a walking distance of 100meters, with a cool and calm atmosphere. This home stay is certified and recognized by the Department of Tourism of Kerala by granting a status of "silver home". In the midst of forest this home stay provides an eco- friendly, homely atmosphere which remains an unforgettable experience for any guest stay over there. Aranya home stay is accessible from Thekkady town with only a distance of 500 meters. The rare species animals like black monkeys can be viewed from the balcony of the home stay, which often come to feed on the fruits on the trees behind the home stay.

The Eco-friendly Resort is located in Thekkady, spread across 1 acre of scenic land and vegetation. Enjoy peaceful stays, bird songs and beautiful sunrise views on-site. Only 1 km from Kumily Bus Station, it also has free WI-Fi and free parking.
Featuring traditional Kerala architecture, all rooms and cottages come with a fan and cable TV. A minibar and coffee machine are included. Private bathrooms are equipped with cold and hot-water showers.
The property is 110 km from Kottayam Railway Station and 165 km from Nedumbassery International Airport in Cochin. The Periyar Tiger Reserve in Thekkady is just a short drive away.

address.addressLine1: Periyar Nest ResortRossapookandam, Opp Panchayat Kulam KumilyThekkady - 685509Kerala, India

location.otherActivities:
Periyar tiger Reserve, Thekkady, is an example of natureâ€™s bounty, with great scenic charm, rich bio diversity and providing veritable visitor satisfaction. Sprawled over an area of 925 Sq .km., Periyar is one of the 27 tiger reserves in India Community based ecotourism
People oriented and park centered community based ecotourism is the hallmark of Periyar Tiger Reserve. These programmes are conducted by local people responsible for the surveillance of the vulnerable parts of the reserve. By taking tourists along, they are involved in the conservation of the forests of Periyar and some valuable revenue is generated for community welfare. People who once made a living by illegal operations in the forests have since become forest protectors and earn their livelihood through these programmes. Hence, as a visitor, when you join them in any of these programmes, you are directly contributing towards forest conservation and community welfare.
An appeal to the visitor You are supporting a noble cause of forest conservation and community welfare by participating in these ecotourism programmes. The interest and participation shown by you is higly appreciated. Let’s make Periyar a heitage for all time to come.
Ecotourism Activities Evergreen, grassland and moist deciduous forests are found here with various species of flora in each type of forestland. The Periyar Reserve shelters over 1800 flowering plants including 171 grass species and 143 species of orchids. The only South Indian conifer, Podocarpus wallichiana grows here. A host of ecotourism activities have been developed for nature lovers in this unique spot. Nature Walk (7 am to 10.30 am, 2 pm to 5 pm) This involves trekking through select nature trails accompanied by trained tribal trackers cum guides. A three-hour interpretative programme, it takes one through interspersed evergreen and moist deciduous forests, providing incredible opportunities for close observation of birds, butterflies and wildlife. Tiger Trail This is a protection-oriented trekking and camping activity with reformed poachers as tourist guides. The most significant aspect of this package is the focus on prevention and detection of illicit activities within the forest. There are two programmes organised twice a week that visitors can choose from. a) One night and two days; max. 5 persons in a group; reporting time: 9 am. b) Two nights and three days; max. 5 persons in a group; reporting time: 9 am. Border Hiking (8 am to 5 pm) A conservation-oriented, hard trek along the boundary of the Tiger Reserve gives you a glimpse of the rich flora and fauna. Two guides and an armed forest guard accompany trekkers on this full-day programme that accommodates minimum 2 persons to maximum 10 persons in two groups each. Bamboo Grove Typical tribal huts, tents and tree houses made exclusively of natural materials and located in a vast bamboo grove in the middle of Anavachal, functions as eco-lodges for visitors. There is also a thatched seminar hall where nature lovers can avail of experiential learning and nature sensitization camps conducted by the forest department. Bamboo Rafting (8 am to 5 pm) The programme involves dawn to dusk trekking and rafting across some of the most luxuriant forest tracts of the Periyar Tiger Reserve. Package involves two hours of trekking, one and a half hours of rafting and then, after a lunch break, a journey back in the same manner. An armed guard and four guides accompany a maximum of 10 persons for this full-day programme. Jungle Camp Apart from camping in tents located on the banks of Periyar River at Vallakkadavu inside the Reserve, the package includes optional activities like visits to the Vanchivayal tribal colony and the historical Mullaperiyar Dam, trekking in the forests, tea factory and spice garden visits, vehicle safari, rafting, boating in the Periyar Lake, boating/angling at Vallakkadavu etc. Two to maximum thirty persons can partake in this camp. Jungle Patrol (7 pm to 10 pm, 10 pm to 1 am, 1 am to 4 pm) Visitors will be accompanied by two watchers and armed forest guards in this night patrolling programme which also helps the forest department in protecting the Reserve. Only upto 24 persons - ie, 4 persons each in two groups on three time slots - will be allowed per day. Night Camping (4 pm to 7 am) Trek for an hour from the forest check post and camp at the jungle inn at Kokkara. Visitors can watch the jungle come alive with avian splendour and at night, experience its silence. They'll also be treated to the enchanting sight of wild animals roaming in the nearby grasslands. Bullock Cart Discoveries (6 am and 2.30 pm) Visit to the farmlands of a tiny hamlet beyond the mountains of Periyar where guides enlighten tourists on the different traditional ways of farming. An optional coracle ride is also included in the package. This three-hour package will have minimum 2 persons and maximum 9 persons. Tribal Heritage (8 am to 12 am, 2 pm to 4 pm) Visit to the tribal heritage museum inside the Mannan settlement that showcases various attractions of the tribal culture. The tour also involves a trek through the tribal hamlet within the periphery of the Reserve, accompanied by a tribal guide. In and Around Peermedu, 39 km from Periyar is a scenic hill town covered with aromatic spice gardens including coffee and vanilla as well as tea, rubber and various other crops
Accessing Periyar Location: Situated on the Kerala-Tamil Nadu border, Periyar Tiger Reserve is about 4 km from Kumily town. Altitude: 900 to 2,019 m above sea level Timing: 6 am to 6 pm Distance Air: The entry point to the Reserve is Thekkady, which is accessible by road from the airports of Madurai (145 km), Kochi (190 km) and Thiruvananthapuram (272 km). Rail: The nearest railhead is Kottayam (114 km). Road: Thekkady is just 5 km from Kumily on NH 220. Kumily's KSRTC Bus Stand has regular connections with all the major cities in Kerala. Thekkady is on SH 19, connecting Munnar to the Periyar Wildlife Sanctuary

address.addressLine1: HOLLYHOCKPothamedu, Munnar, Kerala, India.Pin- 685612

location.otherActivities:
For the Tourist
Mattupetty (13 km from Munnar) Situated at a height of 1700 Mts ,Mattupetty Mattupetty is famous for its highly specialised dairy farm, the Indo-swiss live stock project. Over 100 varietes of high yielding cattle are reared here.Visitors are allowed into three of the eleven cattle sheds at the farm
Visit Time : 0900 - 1100 hrs and 1400 - 1530 hrs. Rate : Rs. 5/- per head. ( liable to change)
The Mattupetty lake and dam , just a short distance from the farm, is a very beautiful picnic spot. The sprawling Kundala tea plantations and the Kundala lake are other attractions in the vicinity. DTPC Idukki provides boating facilities on the Mattupetty Dam. Speed Launch and slow speed motor boats are available on hire.
Pothamedu (6 km from Munnar) Pothamedu offers an excellent view of the tea, coffee and cardamom plantations in Munnar. The rolling hills, the lush mountain and the breathtaking scenery here is ideal for trekking and long mountain walks.
Devikulam (7 km from Munnar) Devikulam This idyllic hill station with its velvet lawns, exotic flora and fauna and the cool mountain air is a rare experience. The Sita Devi Lake with its mineral waters and picturesque surroundings is a good picnic spot. The lake is also ideal for trout fishing.
Pallivasal (8 km from Munnar) This is the venue of the first Hydro Electric Project in Kerala and a place of immence scenic beauty.
Attukal (9 km from Munnar) A panorama of waterfalls and rolling hills, Attukal, located between Munnar and Pallivasal, is a feast for the eyes. The place is also ideal for long treks.
Nyayamakad (10 km from Munnar) Located between Munnar and Rajamala, Nyayamakad is a land of breathtaking waterfalls. The waters cascade down a hill from a height of about 1600 meters. The enchanting surroundings makes an excellent picnic spot and trekking point.
Chithirapuram (10 km from Munnar) With its sleepy little cottages, bungalows, old playgrounds and courts, Chithirapuram still exudes an old world charm. Home of the Pallivasal Hydel Power Project, this hill town is also famous for its picturesque tea plantations.
Lock Heart Gap (13 km from Munnar) This is an ideal place for adventure tourism and trekking. The fresh mountain air, the mist-clad hills and panoramic view make it worthy of a visit.
Rajamala (15 km from Munnar)
The natural habitat of the Niligiri tahr ,Rajamala Rajamala is 2695 Mts above sea level. Half the world's population of the rare mountain goat or tahr which is fast becoming extinct, is now found here.The Niligiri tahr in Rajamala are now to be found in small herds found in Eravikulam-Rajamala region. The total number of Niligiri Tahrs in Rajamala is estimated to be over 1300.
Visiting Time : 0700 - 1800 hrs. Visitors are not allowed during the monsoon. Entry Pass : Rs. 10 for adults, Rs. 5 for children below 12 years, Rs. 50 for foreigners.( liable to change) Permitting Authority : Wild Life DFO, Munnar.
Eravikulam National Park (15 km from Munnar) The 97 sq. km. park is situated in the Devikulam Eravikulam National ParkTaluk and is home to the Nilgiri Tahr. The Anamudi peak (2695 Mts) is located in the Southern region of the park.
Originally established to protect the Nilgiri tahr (Nilgiri Ibex), the Eravikulam National Park is situated in the Devikulam Taluk of the Idukki District. It was declared as a sanctuary in 1975. Considering the ecological, faunal, floral, geo-morphological and zoological significance, it was declared as a National park in 1978. It covers an area of 97 sq kms of rolling grasslands and high level sholas (evergreen forests). The park is breathtakingly beautiful and is easily comparable to the best mountain ranges found anywhere in the world.

accommodation.headline: Master Room stay
accommodation.briefDescription: personalized, experience based holiday
accommodation.description: Whether you are looking for a personalized, experience based holiday or a place to relax and be at peace during your hectic business travel, without compromising on the comforts of a hotel, Brunton House gives you the best of both worlds. With a fine balance of privacy and care, with designer styling, comfort and space, its the perfect answer of a transit home for corporates, and short or long term stay for families or business travelers to Delhi. A secure home in an upmarket area at the heart of south Delhi, with walking distance to popular markets, its equipped with all thats there to make your stay comfortable. A large drawing dining, separate lobby, well kept rooms with attached baths, fully equipped kitchen, housekeeping and the services of a trained and experienced cook. TV with Tata Sky in all rooms along with Wi-fi is also part of the facility. And if theres anything that we may have skipped, we would be happy to take your requirements and provide them to you at the earliest.

accommodation.headline: Goa Home Vacation - Independent Villa near Beach-Colva, Goa
accommodation.description: THIS IS A NEW INDEPENDENT VILLA AND IS LOCATED OPPOSITE TO SAPANA SAPHIRE IN COLVA ,WHICH IS A CHARMING, BEAUTIFUL AND PEACEFUL RESIDENTIAL AREA . IT IS MINUTES AWAY FROM COLVA/BENAULIM BEACH AND RESTAURANTS AND EQUIDISTANT FROM ALL MAJOR LOCATIONS. THE VILLA HAS A LIVING ROOM, WELL EQUIPPED KITCHEN , TWO BEDROOMS (1 MASTER BEDROOM WITH KING SIZE BEDS WITH AN AC), ONE SOFA SET, ONE BATHROOM WITH SHOWER AND IS COMPOUNDED BEAUTIFUL GARDEN AND TERRACE.. ATTRACTIONS AND DISTANCE JUST 5-10 MINS DRIVE TO THE WORLD FAMOUS COLVA ,MAJORDA AND BENAULIM BEACH IN SOUTH GOA WHERE YOU CAN ENJOY WATER SPORTS LIKE PARA SAILING, WATER SCOOTER RIDES, BANANA BOAT RIDES AND RESTAURANTS. LOCATION – NEIGHBORHOOD DESCRIPTION 24 KMS FROM DABOLIM AIRPORT 4 KMS FROM MADGAON BUS TERMINAL 5 KMS FROM MADGAON RAILWAY STATION 1.5 KMS FROM COLVA BEACH 2.5 KM FROM BENAULIM BEACH 4 KM TO MARGAO CITY GRAB A PRE-PAID CAB FROM THE AIRPORT OR WE CAN HELP ARRANGE YOU A CAR. THERE IS A SHUTTLE BUS THAT GOES TO PANJIM. AMENITIES - POWER BACK UP ONLY WITH INVERTOR, - GARDEN AND TERRACE - THE RENT INCLUDES LINEN, TOWELS AND KITCHEN UTENSILS. - REFRIGERATOR, WASHING MACHINE, ELECTRIC KETTLE, MICROWAVE, TV WITH DISH. -TWO BURNER COOKING RANGE WITH TWO GAS CYLINDERS, - FOUR RELAXING CHAIRS - BATHROOMS CONSIST OF TOILET - SHOWER, WASH BASIN . MORE PERIODIC CLEANING CAN BE ARRANGED AT A NOMINAL CHARGE. OTHER ATTRACTIONS: SURROUNDED BY LUSH GREENERY AND PALM TREES NEWLY BUILT INDEPENDENT BUNGALOW AT PEACEFUL PLACE NEAR COLVA BEACH WITH FRONT GARDEN, KITCHEN GARDEN AND BIG TERRACE TO ENJOY SUN WHEN YOU DON'T WANT TO GO TO BEACH.THE HOUSE IS LOCATED IN BEAUTIFUL COLONY WITH NICE HOUSES . YOU AND YOUR KIDS ARE SAFE AND SOUND . THERE IS NO INTERFERENCE OF ANY OUTSIDERS LIKE THAT IN FLATS AND APARTMENTS.VEG/NON VEG FOOD, SERVANT ON REQUEST..IT IS PERFECT FOR A FAMILY WITH KIDS OR ONLY COUPLE, WHO'D LOVE TO EXPERIENCE A QUIET AND PEACEFULLY HOLIDAY RIGHT IN THE MIDDLE OF A GOAN VILLAGE AND ENJOY AT NEAT AND CLEAN BEACHES.THE PLACE IS SAFE AND SECURE WITH VERY NICE NEIGHBORS AROUND YOU. THIS BEING INDEPENDENT HOUSE LOCATED IN RESIDENTIAL COLONY THERE IS NO NUISANCE AS IN FLATS OR APARTMENTS WHICH IS OFTEN CREATED BY SOME TOURISTS AFTER DRINKING.WHEN YOU ARE COMING IN FAMILY AFTER SPENDING SO MUCH MONEY,YOU WOULD LIKE TO STAY AT A PLACE WHERE YOUR PRIVACY IS PROTECTED AND YOU AND YOUR KIDS ARE SAFE AND SECURE. GUESTS ARE REQUESTED TO TAKE CARE OF APPLIANCES,FURNITURE AND FIXTURES.IF ANYTHING IS BROKEN, THE CHARGES WILL BE RECOVERED AS PER MARKET RATE. COLVA IS THE MOST POPULAR BEACH IN SOUTH GOA AMONG THE FOREIGN AND DOMESTIC TOURISTS AS WELL AS THE LOCALS.

accommodation.headline: Independent Room stay
accommodation.briefDescription: Natures rare blend of beauty of beach and backwaters for you
accommodation.description:
This Beach Resort is located around picturesque greenery closely overlooking the clean long beach at the front and serene backwaters behind. Sun rises at the backwater side of the resort and the sunsets in front of the resort in the Arabian sea.
The property is designed in Indian traditional theme with four independent a/c rooms facing sea and three a/c cottages facing backwaters equipped with modern comforts and amenities. The home unit has a large covered terrace space facing sea for dining and relaxed sit outs.
This is the finest sea front property in Kannur with unpolluted atmosphere, crystal clear water and privacy. We assure you a safe and clean stay.
Facilities:
Kerala Cuisine -You can enjoy a variety of fresh cooked Kerala delicacies to suit your taste. Fish and sea food is abundantly available and will be a specialty in our menu. Television & Internet -Televisions are provided in each room and unlimited usage of broadband WI fi internet is allowed. Beach Umbrella And Beds - Available for sunbath 24 Hours Coffee/Tea Table - You can make your own refreshments whenever you need 24 Hours Reservation / Customer Care - You can get 24 hours reservation / customer care support Transportation - Free pick up and drop off can be arranged from any place at Kannur
Local Attractions - We can arrange to see the Theyyam performance (popular Hindu ritual form of worship), Handloom weaving center, Beedi production center and other local attraction around Kannur
Ayurvedic Massage And Treatment - Can be arranged on prior request
The Beach and Backwaters of Kannur: The long Thottada beach is one of the best golden beach of Kerala. You can feel the warmth of the golden rays of sunset in front of our resort. Dolphins are occasionally seen here. The beach is calm and ideal for swimming and sunbathing. The backwaters are a combination of lakes, lagoons and canals. You can see the fisherman catching fish using traditional fishing methods, toddy tapper tapping toddy from the coconut tree, temple festivals and the refreshing typical Kerala rain during monsoon.
accommodation.onsiteFees: Above rates are inclusive of breakfast and dinner. Lunch available at extra cost. Above rates are for double occupancy. Rate for single occupancy will be Rs.2000/- Extra person will be charged at Rs.1000/- Checkout time will be 24 hours Rates are subject to change without prior notice.

address.addressLine1: Shoreline Beach Resort P.O.Thottada, Kannur Kerala, India.

location.otherActivities:
Places to visit in Kannur
Thalassery Fort This fort is constructed by the British East India Company in the year 1708 and is of much important to tourists who are interested in historical events.
Dharmadam Isle This small island which is situated in the sea like a green spot is just 100mtr from shore becomes a blissful experience to tourists. This isle is full of coconut trees.
Muzhappilangad Beach The special feature of this beach is that the vehicle can be driven without getting stuck in the sea sand, which is considered to be the only drive in beach in the State.
St.Angelo Fort Also known as Kannur fort. Standing close to Arabian sea, this fort proclaims the strength and beauty of Portuguese architecture.
Payyambalam Beach One of the most beautiful and long beach in Kerala. This beach has a laterite rock jutting into the sea. A park for the children is being arranged here.
Parassinikadavu Temple This temple is one of the most important temple in the district. The temple is very popular pilgrim site and is visited by many devotees on a daily basis. People irrespective of their caste, creed and religion can enter this temple. The temple conducts a ritual on a daily basis that is known as 'Theyyam'
Parassinikadavu Snake Park This is one of the known snake park in the country. There is a large collection of poisonous and non poisonous snakes.
Vismaya Water Theme Park This park is a blend of amusement, water theme and infotainment park. It has got water rides, informative and entertaining activities for kids and adventurous rides for children.

accommodation.description:
This is a standard Hotel having years of experience in hospitality management. We are respected because of our fine service and facilities. You can enjoy this for a date with nature here.
Kovalam is one of the most beautiful beaches of India. The Sandy beach with four lovely bays stretches for miles. The backdrop of lush, tropical, green palm trees set against long sandy beaches and alluring blue sea is breathtaking combination.
35 well appointed a/c rooms ( Jasmine deluxe & Jasmine superior ) Palm Grove Café – multi cuisine restaurant Out door dining Swimming Pool / Kids Pool Wi Fi Facility Activity centre Ayurveda facility Library Hot water facility Channel TV in rooms Hammocks Travel assistance Doctor on call etc….

accommodation.headline: Room Deluxe A/C stay
accommodation.briefDescription: Kanaka Beach House
accommodation.description: A journey to Kannur , the epicentre of tourists. Malabar will definitely reveal the magic of the land of looms and lore , its history and culture and breath taking scenery. Kanaka Beach house Kannur is offering all these and a lot more for the discerning travellers who want to partake in the unique experience of discovering Malabar. In addition to pleasant stay and fulfilled beach life, Kanaka Beach house also offer exhibition of various traditional art forms such as Kathakali etc; on request. Facilities are provided for Ayurvedic Treatment, Marma chikitsa and viewing Kalaripayattu - the ancient martial art. Sightseeing trips to various destinations like Ezhimala - Naval Academy, Parassini Kadavu temple, nearby hill stations like Wayanad and Coorg etc are also conducted.

address.addressLine1: Beach Road, Payyambalam Beach,Palliyamoola,KannurKeralaIndia

accommodation.headline: Common Room stay
accommodation.briefDescription: Homestay in Jaipur
accommodation.description: Madhu Pushp Bhawan is a home stay where a visitor gets the chance to stay with the family. This gives the opportunity to interact with the family members and get the insight into traditional family life. The visitor also gets the chance to see the Indian cooking demo.

address.addressLine1: 132, Paschim Vihar381, MI Road, Jayanti Market, Pink City, Jaipur, Rajasthan 302001, India

accommodation.description: Boutique B & B, delightful service.

address.addressLine1: 36, Ashoka Crescent

accommodation.headline: Common Room stay
accommodation.briefDescription: Stay in a 300 year old traditional style building
accommodation.description: Ganpati is set in a 300 year old traditional style building which has several floors approached by an easy staircase. There are 12 traditionally decorated, spacious and well ventilated rooms with private bathroom. Some rooms offer dazzling views of the famous Meharangarh fort through the bay windows. It is a good mix of modern comfort and traditional architecture. On the top level is a restaurant serving home cooked food. On the menu there are not only Indian, continental and Italian dishes available but also real brewed coffee with an espresso machine. A large cup of cold coffee with vanilla ice cream is really an exception in Jodhpur. Ganpati is just a few hundred metres north of the bustling Sadar market clock tower. Ganpati is run by a gentle, friendly and helpful family. We would appreciate it if you stay with us and encourage a non commission paying set up to stop spoiling tourism. One can experience a traditional family atmosphere by staying with us. We put extra effort into making our guests' stay not only comfortable but also memorable as so many guests write us back when they go back home. We also organize 'bishnoi village safari' for half a day and we are proud to say that we are the founder of the camel safari around Osiyan in the great Indian Thar desert where one can go for an overnight trip in the desert, camping/home stay and camel ride. Ganpati is recommended by leading guide books LONELY PLANET(RAJASTHAN),ROUGH GUIDE(INDIA),LE GUIDE ROUTARD(FRANCE).

address.addressLine1: Makrana Mohalla
